item.title: Hibernate
item.description:
测试框架

public class studentTest {

	private SessionFactory sessionFactory;
	private Session session;
	private Transaction transaction;

	@Before
	public void init() {
		// 创建配置对象
		Configuration config = new Configuration().configure();
		// 获得服务注册对象
		ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry = new ServiceRegistryBuilder().applySettings(config.getProperties())
				.buildServiceRegistry();
		// 创建工厂对象
		sessionFactory = config.buildSessionFactory(serviceRegistry);
		// 会话对象
		session = sessionFactory.openSession();
		// 开启事物
		transaction = session.beginTransaction();
	}

	@After
	public void destory() {
		// 提交事物
		transaction.commit();
		// 关闭Session
		session.close();
		// 关闭工厂对象
		sessionFactory.close();
	}

	@Test
	public void testSaveStudent() {
		// 生成学生对象
		student s = new student(1, "张三丰", "男", new Date(), "武当山");
		// 保存对象到数据库
		session.save(s);
	}
}

配置文档常用配置

创建表时加前缀

session

getCurrentSession用的时候需要配置xml文档

事物transaction

自动提交

hbm配置文档

主键

映射

对象类型

组件属性

对象里面包含对象

一对多映射

item.title: 树算法的笔记
item.description:
递归遍历二叉树

	void visitTree(TreeNode *p) {
		if (p == NULL) 
		{
			return;
		}
		else {
			cout << p->val << " ";
			visitTree(p->left);
			visitTree(p->right);
		}
	}

利用栈遍历二叉树

	void visitTree_stack(TreeNode *p) {
	//栈实现遍历二叉树
		stack<TreeNode*> s;

		while (p != NULL || !s.empty()) {
			if (p != NULL) {
				cout << p->val << " ";
				s.push(p);
				p = p->left;
			}
			else
			{
				p = s.top();
				s.pop();
				p = p->right;
			}
		}
	}

层次遍历二叉树

利用队列

void visit_ceng(TreeNode *root) {
		//层次遍历
		queue<TreeNode *> q;
		if (root == NULL) 
		{
			return;
		}
		q.push(root);
		TreeNode *tr = root;
		while (!q.empty())
		{
			tr = q.front();
			q.pop();
			cout << tr->val << " ";
			if (tr->left != NULL)
				q.push(tr->left);
			if (tr->right != NULL)
				q.push(tr->right);
		}
	}

层次生成二叉树

同样利用队列

TreeNode * initialTree(string s) 
	{	//建立一棵树
		queue<TreeNode*> que1;//定义一个队列
		TreeNode *t= new TreeNode(s[0]-'0');
		que1.push(t);
		for (int i = 1; i < s.size()-1; i=i+2) 
		{
			TreeNode *p = que1.front();//出一个
			que1.pop();
			if (s[i] != '#') 
			{
				TreeNode *left= new TreeNode(s[i]-'0'); 
				p->left = left;
				que1.push(left); //进一个
			}
			if (s[i + 1] != '#') //先进右子树
			{
				TreeNode *right = new TreeNode(s[i + 1]-'0');
				p->right = right;
				que1.push(right);
			}
		}
		return t;
	}

判断两棵树是否相同

	bool isSameTree(TreeNode *p, TreeNode *q) {
	//判断两棵树是否相同
		if (p == NULL && q == NULL) {
			return true;
		}
		else if (p != NULL && q != NULL && p->val == q->val) {
			return isSameTree(p->left, q->left) && isSameTree(p->right, q->right);
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

树的最大深度

	int maxDepth(TreeNode *root) {
		//树的最大深度
		if (root == NULL) 
		{
			return 0;
		}
		else
		{
			int left = maxDepth(root->left);
			int right = maxDepth(root->right);
			return max(left, right) + 1;//树深度等于左子树深度和右子树深度最大值+1
		}
	}

树的最小深度

树的路径和

bool Solution::hasPathSum(TreeNode * root, int sum)
{	//判断树根到叶子节点的和是否等于sum
	static int count = 0; //避免空树
	if (root== NULL ) //叶子
	{
		if(sum==0&&count!=0)
			return true;
		else
			return false;
	}
	int value = sum-root->val;	
	count++;

	if (root->left == NULL) return hasPathSum(root->right, value); //左子树为空返回右子树深度
	if (root->right == NULL) return hasPathSum(root->left, value);//右子树为空返回左子树深度

	return hasPathSum(root->left, value)|| hasPathSum(root->right, value);
}

找树的路径和并输出

void Solution::path(TreeNode * root, int sum, vector<int> v,vector<vector<int>> *vec) {
	//求树的求和路径
	v.push_back(root->val);
	int val = sum - root->val;
	if (root->left == NULL && root->right==NULL) //叶子节点就结束了
	{	
		if (val== 0)
			vec->push_back(v);
	}
	else if (root->left == NULL) {
		path(root->right,val,v,vec);
	}
	else if (root->right == NULL) {
		path(root->left, val,v,vec);
	}
	else 
	{	
		path(root->left, val, v, vec);
		path(root->right, val, v, vec);
	}
}
vector<vector<int>> Solution::pathSum(TreeNode * root, int sum)
{	//返回求和路径，注意这里的vector要设置成指针类型
	vector<vector<int>> *vec=new vector<vector<int>>();
	if (root == NULL) {
		return *vec;
	}
	vector<int > v;
	path(root, sum, v, vec);
	return *vec;
}

后续遍历栈实现

先访问的后出

vector<int> Solution3::postorderTraversal(TreeNode * root)
{
	vector<int> treeResult;
	stack<TreeNode *> s;
	//stack<int> s2;
	if (root == NULL) {
		return treeResult;
	}
	s.push(root);//根入栈1
	while (!s.empty())
	{
		root = s.top();
		s.pop();
		treeResult.push_back(root->val);
		if (root->left != NULL)
			s.push(root->left);
		if (root->right != NULL) 
			s.push(root->right);
	}
	reverse(treeResult.begin(),treeResult.end());
	return treeResult;
}

连接树的next节点

void Solution3::connect(TreeLinkNode * root)
{
	queue<TreeLinkNode *> q;
	if (root == NULL) {
		return;
	}
	q.push(root);
	root->next = NULL;
	while (!q.empty())
	{
		root = q.front();
		q.pop();
		if (root->left == NULL && root->right==NULL) 
		{
			break;
		}
		q.push(root->left);
		q.push(root->right);
		root->left->next = root->right; //左节点的next为右节点
		if (root->next != NULL) {
			root->right->next = root->next->left; //右子树的next节点
		}
		else
		{
			root->right->next = NULL;
		}
		
	}

}


void Solution3::connect2(TreeLinkNode * root)
{
	queue<TreeLinkNode *> q;
	if (root == NULL) {
		return;
	}
	q.push(root);
	root->next = NULL;
	while (!q.empty())
	{
		root = q.front();
		q.pop();
		if (root->right != NULL) //右节点存在
		{
			if (root->left != NULL) //同时存在,处理左节点
			{
				q.push(root->left);
				root->left->next = root->right; //左节点的next为右节点
			}
			q.push(root->right); //处理右节点
			root->right->next = NULL;
			TreeLinkNode *temp = root;
			while (temp->next != NULL) {
				if (temp->next->left != NULL) {
					root->right->next = temp->next->left; //右子树的next节点
					break;
				}
				else if (temp->next->right != NULL)
				{
					root->right->next = temp->next->right; //右子树的next节点
					break;
				}
				else
				{
					temp = temp->next;
				}
			}	
		}
		else if (root->left != NULL) //只有左节点
		{
			q.push(root->left);
			root->left->next = NULL;
			TreeLinkNode *temp = root;
			while (temp->next != NULL) {
				if (temp->next->left != NULL) {
					root->left->next = temp->next->left; //右子树的next节点
					break;
				}
				else if (temp->next->right != NULL)
				{
					root->left->next = temp->next->right; //右子树的next节点
					break;
				}
				else
				{
					temp = temp->next;
				}
			}
		}
		else //叶子节点
		{
			continue;
		}


	}
}
